title: Basic Life Support
description: For the patients who need medical transportation, it has bed & life saving devices.

title: Mortuary Ambulance
description: Mortuary ambulance services are used to move the dead body from one place to another.

title: Advanced Life Support
description: ALS ambulance is equipped with ventilator, ECG monitoring device and paramedic staff.

title: Patient Transport Vehicle
description: PTV is a non emergency patient transport vehicle fully equipped just like a normal ambulance.

title: Domestic Special Airambulance
description: The main aim of helicopter emergency medical ambulance is to transfer the trauma patients within the golden hour domestically.

title: International Special Airambulance
description: The main aim of helicopter emergency medical ambulance is to transfer the trauma patients within the golden hour internationally.

title: Hospital Tent
description: A field hospital is a large mobile medical unit that allows the injured to be treated provisionally in the same place before they can be transferred safely to a fixed hospital.

title: Mobile ICU
description: This class of vehicles is intended for the care of high-risk patients, vital risk and serious diseases.
